mapper.select: SELECT * from Customer where personid=#{id} or phone=#{id}
SELECT * from Customer where (personid=#{id} or phone=#{id}) and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Customer (personid, name, gender,phone,address,passwd) VALUES (#{personid}, #{name}, #{gender},#{phone},#{address},#{passwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE Customer SET personid=#{personid}, name=#{name}, gender=#{gender},phone=#{phone},address=#{address},passwd=#{passwd} WHERE personid=#{personid} or phone=#{phone}
